text: hi, have you done this before?
no i haven't
Can I tell a little about save the children?
Sure, I'd love to hear about it
It's non governmental and international. It helps children and their families here and in poor countries. Have you been to the site?
I have never been to the site. Could you provide me with the link
sure, it's  URL There you will see that for the price of a soda you can help a child in need. Would you like to donate?
Not today but I'll definitely save the website for the future. What type of help do you provide to those poor families?

They help children in war zones. Wouldn't you like to donate something today? Is a trustable fund. Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment
I appreciate you informing about this but i'll be donsting at a later time

maybe you will reconsider, acting today is the best way to directly help children and families in need. It won't hurt to donate $25 today, how bout it? The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children for us.
Could you explain to me what the 25$ will go to exactly, is it for building houses, farms, shelters,...
sure, you can sponsor a child, help with U.s. relief or health and education for a child in a developing country. That's alot of help, how bout it? Can I count you in for a donation?
You definitely can...but not today. Sorry
maybe just $0.01? It still will go a long way.
oh sure, i didnt know i could send that amount. I'll give 0.1 today
Ok, thank you. That $0.01 donation will go a long way to helping children. Is there anymore info that you would like
Yes, I just want to make sure that you read properly that I'm giving 0.1 not 0.01. Thank you
Yes I got it, $0.10. Thanks and I think we can submit now
great, yeah i think we can
